text:
e="preserve">Vikramasingapuram is a municipal town in Tirunelveli District in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is under the Ambasamudram Taluk. As of 2011, the town had a population of 47,241.
Demographics.
According to 2011 census, Vikramasingapuram had a population of 47,241. The town has a sex-ratio of 1,058 females for every 1,000 males. As per the religious census of 2011, Vikramasingapuram had 78.62% Hindus, 7.45% Muslims, 13.83% Christians, 0.02% Sikhs, 0.02% Buddhists and 0.05% following other religions.
